Snuffo (ZX Spectrum)
by Fadge Games
Updated 2017-12-07

Play as Snuffo the clown, running round town murdering children.  
Can be loaded on any Spectrum emulator, or saved to cassette tape and loaded on a real machine.  
This is my first game, I was just messing around in CGD to see what I could make.


https://fadge-games.itch.io/snuffo
